titles.title: A resolution honoring the educational and scientific significance of Dr. Jane Goodall on the 50th anniversary of the beginning of her work in what is today Gombe Stream National Park in Tanzania.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 7/14/2010--Introduced. Recognizes the 50th anniversary of the beginning of Dr. Jane Goodall's work in what is now Tanzania as significant in scientific history. Recognizes the significant role that Dr. Goodall's work and scientific study have had on our knowledge and understanding of both the natural and human worlds. Recognizes the positive role that Dr. Goodall's work and research have had in education, science, and conservation alike.
